alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 9:53PM CDT until June 25 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grant County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Eastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 953 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hot Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Benton... Bryant... Malvern... Haskell... Rockport... Traskwood... Tull... Prattsville... Poyen... Perla... Jenkins Ferry State Park... East End... Thiel... Salem in Saline County... Bauxite... Belfast... Magnet Cove... Lono... Gifford... Shaw... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
